TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1021
TEI.2.document_title: A. H. Philips to Stephen F. Austin, 01-17-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: A. H. Philips to Austin, January 17, 1825. Land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1021

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*A. H. Philips to Austin, January 17, 1825. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-17-1825">Jany 17, 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Sir We have examined the Labours on this *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned* and situated *location_mentioned*5th 6th 9th on the west*/location_mentioned* and the *location_mentioned*5th on the East sides of the river*/location_mentioned*—Our horses being much worn puts it out of our power to return by your *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*to make entries in person but hope that you will reserve the land for us*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*A. H. Philips*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Esq*/p*
*/div1*
